title: COVID-19 Commodity Codes List
description: Find out how to pay no import duty and VAT on protective equipment, relevant medical devices or equipment brought into the UK from non-EU countries during the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll down to COVID-19 Commodity Codes List and open the CSV
notes: The relief applies to imports into the UK from 30 January 2020 until 31 December 2020.
